com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library

类 PullToRefreshBase<T extends android.view.View>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.LinearLayout
          • com.handmark.pulltorefresh.library.PullToRefreshBase<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, IPullToRefresh<T>
    直接已知子类:
    PullToRefreshAdapterViewBase, PullToRefreshHorizontalScrollView, PullToRefreshScrollView, PullToRefreshWebView

    public abstract class PullToRefreshBase<T extends android.view.View>
extends android.widget.LinearLayout
implements IPullToRefresh<T>

      Simple Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has scrolled to the end of the AdapterView.

      Listener that allows you to be notified when the user has started or finished a touch event.

      Simple Listener to listen for any callbacks to Refresh.

      An advanced version of the Listener to listen for callbacks to Refresh.

      • demo

        public final boolean demo()
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Demos the Pull-to-Refresh functionality to the user so that they are aware it is there. This could be useful when the user first opens your app, etc. The animation will only happen if the Refresh View (ListView, ScrollView, etc) is in a state where a Pull-to-Refresh could occur by a user's touch gesture (i.e. scrolled to the top/bottom).
        指定者:
        demo 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        返回:
        true - if the Demo has been started, false if not.

      • getCurrentMode

        public final PullToRefreshBase.Mode getCurrentMode()
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Get the mode that this view is currently in. This is only really useful when using Mode.BOTH.
        指定者:
        getCurrentMode 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        返回:
        Mode that the view is currently in

      • getFilterTouchEvents

        public final boolean getFilterTouchEvents()
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Returns whether the Touch Events are filtered or not. If true is returned, then the View will only use touch events where the difference in the Y-axis is greater than the difference in the X-axis. This means that the View will not interfere when it is used in a horizontal scrolling View (such as a ViewPager).
        指定者:
        getFilterTouchEvents 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        返回:
        boolean - true if the View is filtering Touch Events

      • getLoadingLayoutProxy

        public final ILoadingLayout getLoadingLayoutProxy()
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Returns a proxy object which allows you to call methods on all of the LoadingLayouts (the Views which show when Pulling/Refreshing).

        You should not keep the result of this method any longer than you need it.

        指定者:
        getLoadingLayoutProxy 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        返回:
        Object which will proxy any calls you make on it, to all of the LoadingLayouts.

      • getLoadingLayoutProxy

        public final ILoadingLayout getLoadingLayoutProxy(boolean includeStart,
                                   boolean includeEnd)
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Returns a proxy object which allows you to call methods on the LoadingLayouts (the Views which show when Pulling/Refreshing). The actual LoadingLayout(s) which will be affected, are chosen by the parameters you give.

        You should not keep the result of this method any longer than you need it.

        指定者:
        getLoadingLayoutProxy 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        参数:
        includeStart - - Whether to include the Start/Header Views
        includeEnd - - Whether to include the End/Footer Views
        返回:
        Object which will proxy any calls you make on it, to the LoadingLayouts included.

        指定者:

      • setFilterTouchEvents

        public final void setFilterTouchEvents(boolean filterEvents)
        从接口复制的说明: IPullToRefresh
        Set the Touch Events to be filtered or not. If set to true, then the View will only use touch events where the difference in the Y-axis is greater than the difference in the X-axis. This means that the View will not interfere when it is used in a horizontal scrolling View (such as a ViewPager), but will restrict which types of finger scrolls will trigger the View.
        指定者:
        setFilterTouchEvents 在接口中 IPullToRefresh<T extends android.view.View>
        参数:
        filterEvents - - true if you want to filter Touch Events. Default is true.

      • createRefreshableView

        protected abstract T createRefreshableView(android.content.Context context,
                      android.util.AttributeSet attrs)
        This is implemented by derived classes to return the created View. If you need to use a custom View (such as a custom ListView), override this method and return an instance of your custom class.

        Be sure to set the ID of the view in this method, especially if you're using a ListActivity or ListFragment.

        参数:
        context - Context to create view with
        attrs - AttributeSet from wrapped class. Means that anything you include in the XML layout declaration will be routed to the created View
        返回:
        New instance of the Refreshable View

      • updateUIForMode

        protected void updateUIForMode()
        Updates the View State when the mode has been set. This does not do any checking that the mode is different to current state so always updates.
